body_html:
How would we like to handle the event that the window + stride does not divide evenly into the length of the dataset?

eg: [0,1,2,3,4] window=3 stride=1 --> [[0,1,2],[1,2,3],[2,3,4]] OK
eg: [0,1,2,3,4] window=3 stride=3 --> [[0,1,2][3,4]] (size of last window is smaller)
or just [[0,1,2]] (end early)
my current solution just quits out early
body_text:

eg: [0,1,2,3,4] window=3 stride=3 --> [[0,1,2][3,4]] (size of last window is smaller)
or just [[0,1,2]] (end early)
my current solution just quits out early
body:
How would we like to handle the event that the window + stride does not divide evenly into the length of the dataset?

eg: [0,1,2,3,4] window=3 stride=1 --> [[0,1,2],[1,2,3],[2,3,4]] OK
eg: [0,1,2,3,4] window=3 stride=3 --> [[0,1,2][3,4]] (size of last window is smaller) 
                                                                or just [[0,1,2]] (end early)
my current solution just quits out early
